statements: SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData
SELECT meter_id, reading_date, water_usage FROM WaterUsageData
SELECT location_id, efficiency FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_usage > 100
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData ORDER BY reading_date DESC
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS average_water_usage FROM WaterUsageData
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE location_id = 100 ORDER BY reading_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT meter_id, water_usage FROM WaterUsageData WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency DESC
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS average_usage, MAX(efficiency) AS max_efficiency FROM WaterUsageData WHERE reading_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM WaterUsageData WHERE water_usage > 100 AND efficiency < 0.5 ORDER BY meter_id ASC
SELECT reading_date, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM WaterUsageData GROUP BY reading_date HAVING total_water_usage > 500 ORDER BY reading_date
SELECT * FROM smart_water_meters;
SELECT location, reading_date FROM smart_water_meters ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(water_usage) AS average_water_usage FROM smart_water_meters;
SELECT * FROM smart_water_meters WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT analysis_id, efficiency_rating, analysis_date FROM water_efficiency_analysis;
SELECT * FROM smart_water_meters WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY reading_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, water_usage FROM smart_water_meters WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY location ASC, reading_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, location, AVG(water_usage) AS avg_usage FROM smart_water_meters GROUP BY meter_id, location HAVING avg_usage > 50 ORDER BY avg_usage DESC;

SELECT w.*, a.efficiency_rating FROM smart_water_meters w INNER JOIN water_efficiency_analysis a ON w.meter_id = a.meter_id WHERE a.efficiency_rating >= 4 ORDER BY a.analysis_date ASC, w.reading_date DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS meter_count FROM smart_water_meters GROUP BY location HAVING meter_count >= 2 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeters;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM WaterMeters WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM CustomerInfo WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM MeterData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT meter_id, water_flow_rate, pressure FROM MeterData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT id, location, water_consumed FROM WaterMeters WHERE water_consumed > 100 ORDER BY water_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM MeterData WHERE pressure BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM CustomerInfo WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT meter_id, MAX(water_flow_rate) AS max_flow_rate FROM MeterData GROUP BY meter_id ORDER BY max_flow_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeters wm JOIN MeterData md ON wm.meter_id = md.meter_id WHERE wm.location = 'Main Street' AND md.temperature > 25 ORDER BY md.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeters;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM WaterMeters WHERE household_id = 1;
SELECT reading_id, reading_date, usage_gallons FROM WaterReadings ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, event_type, event_date FROM MeterEvents WHERE event_type = 'maintenance';
SELECT meter_id, error_type, error_description FROM MeterErrors WHERE error_type = 'critical' ORDER BY error_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterMeters;
SELECT meter_id, location, meter_type FROM WaterMeters WHERE household_id = 1001;
SELECT reading_date, usage_gallons FROM WaterReadings ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM MeterEvents WHERE meter_id = 2002 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT meter_id, error_type, error_description FROM MeterErrors WHERE error_type = 'Warning';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT address, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM smart_meters ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electric';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_type = 'Electric' ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT reading_value FROM water_readings WHERE meter_id = 10 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT meter_id, AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM usage_statistics GROUP BY meter_id HAVING AVG(efficiency) > 0.75;
